definition: large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: No examination centres will be set up in any overseas cities for the coming CRE.
sentences.chinese: 當局不會爲是次考試在海外城市設立試場。

sentences.english: Note : (1) Driving tests for articulated vehicle are available at Shatin Centre only.
sentences.chinese: 掛接式車輛的駕駛考試只在沙田試場舉行。

sentences.english: A test-taker should present either a valid passport with photo attached or an ARC card to the test centers.
sentences.chinese: 請攜帶附有照片的護照或居留證正本到試場參加考試。

sentences.english: A test-taker should present either a valid passport or an ARC card to the test center.
sentences.chinese: 請攜帶護照或居留證正本到試場參加考試。

sentences.english: No early leaves are permitted in examinations where multiple-choice questions are set.
sentences.chinese: 學生不得於任何選擇題形式的考試中提早離開試場。

definition: to substitute/to complement in the proper order/to fill vacancies progressively
to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
Kanting township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Dounan or Tounan town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
